SELECT a.id, a.user_id, a.student_no, a.name, CASE WHEN a.birth_date IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT(a.birth_date, ' 00:00:00') ELSE NULL END AS birth_date, a.home_address, b.sex, a.id_card, a.enrollment_year, a.grade_dept_id, a.class_dept_id, a.graduation_status, a.psychological_status, a.risk_level, a.special_marks, a.remark, a.create_time, a.update_time, b.mobile, c.name AS gradeName, d.name AS className, e.nickname AS updater FROM lvye_student_profile a LEFT JOIN system_users b ON a.user_id = b.id LEFT JOIN system_dept c ON a.grade_dept_id = c.id LEFT JOIN system_dept d ON a.class_dept_id = d.id LEFT JOIN system_users e ON a.updater = e.id
a.deleted = 0 and a.id = #{studentProfileId}

SELECT a.*,b.sex,b.mobile,c.name AS gradeName, d.name AS className FROM lvye_student_profile a LEFT JOIN system_users b ON a.user_id = b.id LEFT JOIN system_dept c ON a.grade_dept_id = c.id LEFT JOIN system_dept d ON a.class_dept_id = d.id
a.deleted = 0 and a.user_id = #{userId}
select class_dept_id AS dept_id, count(*) AS count from lvye_student_profile where deleted = 0 group by class_dept_id;
select grade_dept_id AS dept_id, count(*) AS count from lvye_student_profile where deleted = 0 group by grade_dept_id;
